components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud

incident_updates.body: End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022 We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware. Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline. Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure: https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Start time : 10/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 10/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : A few seconds of I/O freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade our OS version.

Start time : 11/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 11/10/2022 11:00 UTC Service impact : A few seconds of I/O freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade our OS versions.

Start time: 12/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time: 12/10/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact: A few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times) Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to Hosted Private Cloud products to maintain consistency.

Start time : 12/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 12/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : A few seconds of I/O freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade our OS version.

Start time : 13/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 13/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : A few seconds of I/O freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade some of our network equipments

Start time : 17/10/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 16/12/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance the backup and restore will be unavailable. Service improvement : The objectif of this maintenance is to remove Active Directory connected to the VMs.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Start time : 17/10/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 18/10/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment
